metadata.name: WebDav Put Request
metadata.comment: A General detection for WebDav user-agent being used to PUT files on a WebDav network share. This could be an indicator of exfiltration.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM http_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 7 AND contains(lower(http_request.user_agent), lower('webdav')) AND lower(http_request.http_method) = lower('put') AND NOT (((CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[0] AS BIGINT) * 16777216 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[1] AS BIGINT) * 65536 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[2] AS BIGINT) * 256 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[3] AS BIGINT)) & 4278190080) = 167772160 /* CIDR: 10.0.0.0/8 */ OR ((CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[0] AS BIGINT) * 16777216 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[1] AS BIGINT) * 65536 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[2] AS BIGINT) * 256 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[3] AS BIGINT)) & 4278190080) = 2130706432 /* CIDR: 127.0.0.0/8 */ OR ((CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[0] AS BIGINT) * 16777216 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[1] AS BIGINT) * 65536 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[2] AS BIGINT) * 256 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[3] AS BIGINT)) & 4293918720) = 2886729728 /* CIDR: 172.16.0.0/12 */ OR ((CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[0] AS BIGINT) * 16777216 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[1] AS BIGINT) * 65536 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[2] AS BIGINT) * 256 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[3] AS BIGINT)) & 4294901760) = 3232235520 /* CIDR: 192.168.0.0/16 */ OR ((CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[0] AS BIGINT) * 16777216 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[1] AS BIGINT) * 65536 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[2] AS BIGINT) * 256 + CAST(split(dst_endpoint.ip, '\\.')[3] AS BIGINT)) & 4294901760) = 2851995648 /* CIDR: 169.254.0.0/16 */))

output.summary: A General detection for WebDav user-agent being used to PUT files on a WebDav network share. This could be an indicator of exfiltration.
